comment.author: 30937372@N00
comment._content: The man standing is a young Kenneth Kaunda

comment.author: 59430401@N06
comment._content: Kaunda's first government job after the 'one man one vote' election of 1962 was as Minister of Local Government.  Thus presumably shows him in this role speaking at the HQ of the NR Information Services surrounded by his (and Information) civi servants.

comment.author: 60406173@N04
comment._content: The person on the left wearing a chain of office would presumably be the Mayor of Lusaka
